name: TNTJ Thiruvithancode Masjid
description: The TNTJ Thiruvithancode Masjid in Kanyakumari district is recognized for its affiliation with the Tamil Nadu Thowheed Jamaath (TNTJ), promoting Islamic teachings and community welfare. It serves as a hub for religious gatherings, educational activities, and social initiatives, fostering unity and spiritual growth among worshippers.
location: THURAPPU, JUNCTION, Thiruvattar - Colachel Rd, Thiruvithankodu, Thiruvithamcode, Tamil Nadu 629174
